turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How do you serve a regular black coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you don't want to add any milks or sugars?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a large black coffee to be picked up at the pete's in shawnburg illinois, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
